ygData.subject: Re: Are there ANY half-elf warriors besides me?
ygData.msgSnippet: Half-elf should wear medium size armor - I think.  I got mine by hunting for lions with a group of friends (hard to do solo with no armor.)  You save the
ygData.messageBody:
Half-elf should wear "medium" size armor - I think.� I got mine by hunting
for lions with a group of friends (hard to do solo with no armor.)� You save
the "ruined" lion pelts (and sell the high quality ones) and then find a
tailor to make you some patch work leather armor.� One of my friends
developed tailoring skill but sometimes others will offer to make some for
gp.
�
I am not familiar with your part of the world since I spend my time near
Qeynos and the West Karanas (lion country).� Have you travelled that far?
�
Hopefully, soon I will have some patch work to sell :) as I am thinking it
is getting to be time for some banded for me <g>
�
Snyak

-----Original Message-----
From: Chuck Schwan [mailto:cschwan@...]
Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 10:43 AM
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
Subject: [warriors_eq] Are there ANY half-elf warriors besides me?


Just wondering if there are any half-elf warriors out there.� I am level 5
now and am hanging around with a high elf wizard and a wood elf ranger (Both
level 8).� We can do some serious damage, but it is tough to know what I
should be working on since no one else seems to match my race/class.� ANY
info you can give would be good.� Also, what armor can I use?� I haven't
found any near Kelethin of Felwithe that is compatible with me.� Oh well,
not much near those cities can really put the hurt on me anyway, unless I
got grouped up on by some Orc Centurions, even they don't usually stand a
chance when I fight the one's that con white to me (or yellow sometimes) and
I get the alone.�
�
Xangor
